TopicTitle: When are the part costs going to be sorted out?

Articles.Content: With contracts coming soon and perhaps currency as well I'm wondering when the part costs are going to be redone? I use kerbal engineer so I can see how much each rocket costs atm and I've noticed that my heaviest lifters are all much cheaper than my smaller ones due to the ARM parts not costing much at all.

According to Rowsdower's post here budgets (and therefore, presumably currency) will not be implemented in 0.24. Without budgets, the part costs are meaningless, so I think it's very very unlikely that we'll see part costs change or have any meaning in 0.24.
